After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of insurance policies renewed compared to the total number of policies due for renewal, reflecting the success of renewal efforts.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Insurance Policies / Total Number of Expiring Insurance Policies) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Assessment of how well insurance policies meet customer needs for coverage, based on customer feedback and policy evaluations.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Rating of Insurance Policy Coverage Adequacy from Customer Feedback

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which insurance policies adhere to legal and regulatory requirements, measured through audits and compliance checks.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Policies / Total Number of Policies) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with their insurance policies, including coverage, cost, and service, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Insurance Policies

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process insurance claims from submission to resolution, reflecting the efficiency of the claims handling process.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Process Insurance Policy Claims

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Trends in the costs of insurance premiums over time, indicating changes in pricing strategies and market conditions.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Current Premium Cost - Previous Premium Cost) / Previous Premium Cost * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who renew their insurance policies compared to the total number of customers eligible for renewal, indicating retention success.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Renewals / Number of Policies Eligible for Renewal) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which insurance policies are updated to reflect new information, changes, or regulatory requirements, measured by the number of updates per year.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Number of Updates to Insurance Policies / Number of Months

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to process insurance claims from initial submission to final resolution, reflecting efficiency in claims management.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Process Claims

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of claims settled compared to the total number of claims filed, indicating the effectiveness of the claims resolution process.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Claims Settled / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the claims management process, including handling, resolution, and communication, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Claims Management

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of claims processed correctly without errors, reflecting the precision of the claims handling process.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to process each insurance claim, including administrative and operational expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Processing Claims / Total Number of Claims Processed

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of insurance claims denied compared to the total number of claims submitted, reflecting the stringency of the claims approval process.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Denied Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which fraudulent claims are detected compared to the total number of claims processed, indicating the effectiveness of fraud prevention measures.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Fraudulent Claims Detected / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: Claims management compliance with legal requirements.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the claims management process complies with legal requirements, measured through audits and regulatory reviews.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Claims / Total Number of Claims) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Total number of insurance policies sold over a specific period, indicating the success of insurance sales efforts.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Total Number of Insurance Policies Sold

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of insurance leads or prospects converted into actual sales, reflecting the effectiveness of the sales process.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Insurance Sales / Total Number of Leads) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with insurance sales process.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the insurance sales process, including interactions with agents, clarity of information, and service quality.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for the Insurance Sales Process

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from insurance sales.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from insurance sales compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Revenue from Insurance Sales - Cost of Insurance Sales) / Cost of Insurance Sales * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each insurance policy sold, including marketing, sales, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Insurance Sales / Total Number of Insurance Policies Sold

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which new and innovative insurance products are developed, measured by the number of new products introduced per year.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of New Insurance Products Introduced / Total Number of Insurance Products) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: Insurance sales effectiveness in target markets.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of how effectively insurance sales strategies are implemented in targeted markets, based on sales performance metrics and market penetration.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Sales in Target Markets / Total Number of Sales Opportunities in Target Markets) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which insurance sales practices adhere to legal and regulatory requirements, measured through audits and compliance checks.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Sales Transactions / Total Number of Sales Transactions) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of existing policies renewed compared to the total number of policies up for renewal, indicating the effectiveness of renewal efforts.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Policies / Total Number of Policies Expiring) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: Customer retention rate through policy renewals.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers retained through policy renewals compared to the total number of customers, reflecting the success of retention strategies.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Renewals by Existing Customers / Total Number of Renewal Opportunities) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of policy renewal offers converted into actual renewals, indicating the effectiveness of renewal offers and processes.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Policies / Total Number of Renewal Offers Sent) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from policy renewals.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from policy renewals compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Revenue from Policy Renewals - Cost of Policy Renewals) / Cost of Policy Renewals * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to process each policy renewal, including administrative and operational expenses.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Processing Policy Renewals / Total Number of Policy Renewals

After Sales+Insurance Services.KPIS: Policy renewal compliance with regulatory requirements.
After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which policy renewal processes adhere to legal and regulatory requirements, measured through audits and compliance checks.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Renewals / Total Number of Policy Renewals) * 100

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the policy renewal process, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Policy Renewal Process

After Sales+Insurance Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which improvements are made to the policy renewal process based on feedback and performance reviews.
After Sales+Insurance Services.FORMULA: (Current Process Efficiency Score - Previous Process Efficiency Score) / Previous Process Efficiency Score * 100
